ThrillerMovies.title: Escape Plan 2
ThrillerMovies.description: Years after he fought his way out of an inescapable prison, Ray Breslin has organized a new top-notch security force. But when one of his team members goes missing, Breslin must return to the hell he once escaped from.
ThrillerMovies.stars: Sylvester Stallone, Dave Baustista, Xiaoming Huang

ThrillerMovies.title: Insidious: The Last Key
ThrillerMovies.description: Parapsychologist Dr. Elise Rainier faces her most fearsome and personal haunting yet, as she is drawn back to her ghostly childhood home, where the terror began.
ThrillerMovies.stars: Lin Shaye, Leigh Whannell, Angus Sampson

ThrillerMovies.title: The Night Comes for Us
ThrillerMovies.description: Ito (Joe Taslim), a gangland enforcer, caught amidst a treacherous and violent insurrection within his Triad crime family upon his return home from a stint abroad.
ThrillerMovies.stars: Iko Uwais, Joe Taslim, Julie Estelle

ThrillerMovies.title: Truth or Dare
ThrillerMovies.description: A harmless game of Truth or Dare among friends turns deadly when someone or something begins to punish those who tell a lie or refuse the dare.
ThrillerMovies.stars: Lucy Hale, Tyler Posey, Violett Beane
